com.opengamma.strata.function

Class StandardComponents

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opengamma.strata.function.StandardComponents

  • public class StandardComponents
extends Object
    Factory methods for creating standard Strata components.

    These components are suitable for performing calculations using the built-in asset classes, market data types and pricers. The market data must provided by the user.

    The market data factory can create market data values derived from other values. For example it can create calibrated curves given market quotes. However it cannot request market data from an external provider, such as Bloomberg, or look up data from a data store, for example a time series database.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

      static CalculationEngine calculationEngine()
      Returns a calculation engine capable of calculating the standard set of measures for the standard asset classes, using market data provided by the caller.

      Returns a calculation runner which uses a fixed thread pool.
      static MarketDataFactory marketDataFactory()

      static List<MarketDataFunction<?,?>> marketDataFunctions()
      Returns the standard market data functions used to build market data values from other market data.
      static PricingRules pricingRules()
      Returns the standard pricing rules.

    • Method Detail

      • calculationEngine

        public static CalculationEngine calculationEngine()
        Returns a calculation engine capable of calculating the standard set of measures for the standard asset classes, using market data provided by the caller.

        The engine can create market data values derived from other values. For example it can create calibrated curves given market quotes. However it cannot request market data from an external provider, such as Bloomberg, or look up data from a data store, for example a time series database.

        Returns:
        a calculation engine capable of performing calculations for the built-in market data types and measures using market data provided by the caller

      • calculationRunner

        public static CalculationRunner calculationRunner()
        Returns a calculation runner which uses a fixed thread pool.

        The thread count is the same as the number of cores.

        Returns:
        a calculation runner which uses a fixed thread pool

      • marketDataFactory

        public static MarketDataFactory marketDataFactory()
        Returns a market data factory containing the standard set of market data functions.

        This factory can create market data values from other market data. For example it can create calibrated curves given a set of market quotes for the points on the curve.

        The set of functions are the ones provided by marketDataFunctions().

        Returns:
        a market data factory containing the standard set of market data functions

      • marketDataFunctions

        public static List<MarketDataFunction<?,?>> marketDataFunctions()
        Returns the standard market data functions used to build market data values from other market data.

        These include functions to build:

        • Par rates from quotes
        • Curve groups from par rates
        • Curves from curve groups
        • Discount factors and index rates from curves
        Returns:
        the standard market data functions

      • pricingRules

        public static PricingRules pricingRules()
        Returns the standard pricing rules.

        These rules define how to calculate the standard measures for the standard asset classes.

        The standard pricing rules require no further configuration and are designed to allow easy access to all built-in asset class coverage. The supported asset classes are:

        • Bullet Payment - BulletPaymentTrade
        • Credit Default Swap - CdsTrade
        • Deliverable Swap Future - DeliverableSwapFutureTrade
        • Forward Rate Agreement - FraTrade
        • FX single (spot/forward) - FxSingleTrade
        • FX NDF - FxNdfTrade
        • FX swap - FxSwapTrade
        • Generic Future - GenericFutureTrade
        • Generic Future Option - GenericFutureOptionTrade
        • Ibor Future (STIR) - IborFutureTrade
        • Rate Swap - SwapTrade
        • Term Deposit - TermDepositTrade
        Returns:
        pricing rules defining how to calculate the standard measures for the standard asset classes
